means: 像噩梦压迫着人的事物

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... incubator n 孵卵器；早产儿育儿箱 incubus n 恶魇，梦魇 concubine n 情妇，妾.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... succubus 女妖，恶魔 incubus 恶梦，负担 abacus 算盘.

男夜魔（Incubus）：恶梦的精灵，在拉丁语中有「骑在上方者」之意。女性外表的女夜魔（Succubus），在到了中世纪时被认为是 …

list.abs: 此译本仅有两部，于公元935年由匿名的修道士译成。两本书都是手抄本，墨水据说是用名为“男梦魔之子”(incubus-spawned)的怪物的血液做的，呈奇异的红黑色。这是一本冗长的书，封面由鲨鱼皮、书扣由人骨制成。译本的内容和原典差.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: late Latin form of Latin incubo 'nightmare', from incubare 'lie on' (see incubate)

encyclopedia.content: 西方传说中的恶魔 Succubus 女性梦魔，在男子睡觉的时候降临并与之交媾的女妖，源自中世纪的传说，一般形象为有翼有尾的妖艳女子，会吸取男人的精气。[比如：莉莉丝代表] Incubus 男性梦魔，是指在女子睡觉的时候降临并与之交媾的男妖，一般形象为美男子，会吸取女人的精气。通常情况下十天就可以吸光一个女人的精气。 生理现象 人在睡觉时，突然感到仿佛有千斤重物压身朦朦胧胧的喘不过气来，似醒非醒似睡非睡，想喊喊不出，想动

means.word_mean: 1. a male demon believed to lie on sleeping persons and to have sexual intercourse with sleeping women
2. a situation resembling a terrifying dream
3. someone who depresses or worries others

auth_sentence.content: What an incubus my aesthetic personality might become if I were...trapped within it.
auth_sentence.res_content: What an incubus my aesthetic personality might become if I were...trapped within it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What an incubus my aesthetic personality might become if I were...trapped within it.

auth_sentence.content: She dismissed the titular head of her department as an incubus around the Departmental neck.
auth_sentence.res_content: She dismissed the titular head of her department as an incubus around the Departmental neck.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She dismissed the titular head of her department as an incubus around the Departmental neck.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =lie down,表示"躺"; 2. =barrier,表示躺的"东西,障碍"

stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+cub躺+ine女人→一起躺着的女人→情妇
cub躺+icle小东西,小地方→躺的小地方
incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+ion状态,过程→n.孵卵期,潜伏期

stems_affixes.value_cn: 孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
stems_affixes.word_buile: incubate[v.孵化;使发展]+or物器→n.孵卵器,早产婴儿保育箱
in进入+cub躺+us→[人入睡时]躺在人身体上[或里面]的东西
in向内+cub躺+ate表动词→躺在里面→孵卵
